ingamegui.name: In-game GUI
ingamegui.desc: Hotkeys for the in-game user interface.

quicksave.name: Quicksave
quicksave.desc: Make a temporary save of the game that can be loaded with quickload. Quicksaving always overwrites the previous save.

quickload.name: Quickload
quickload.desc: Load the latest quicksaved game. Does nothing if no quicksaves exist.

session.gui.toggle.name: Toggle GUI visibility
session.gui.toggle.desc: Toggle visibility of the in-game user interface.

teamchat.name: Toggle team chat
teamchat.desc: Toggle chat window in team chat mode.

privatechat.name: Toggle private chat
privatechat.desc: Toggle chat window and select the previous private chat partner.

lobby.name: Toggle MP lobby
lobby.desc: Show the multiplayer lobby in a dialog window.

realtime.toggle.name: Toggle real-time overlay
realtime.toggle.desc: Toggle current display of computer time.

timeelapsedcounter.toggle.name: Toggle game-time overlay
timeelapsedcounter.toggle.desc: Shows the game time elapsed since the game started.

session.showstatusbars.name: Toggle status bars
session.showstatusbars.desc: Toggle display of status bars e.g. health indicator for all your buildings/units on the map (including unselected).

session.toggleattackrange.name: Toggle attack ranges
session.toggleattackrange.desc: Toggle display of attack range overlays of selected defensive structures.

session.toggleaurasrange.name: Toggle aura ranges
session.toggleaurasrange.desc: Toggle display of aura range overlays of selected units and structures.

session.togglehealrange.name: Toggle heal ranges
session.togglehealrange.desc: Toggle display of heal range overlays of selected units.

session.timewarp.fastforward.name: Fast-forward (timewarp)
session.timewarp.fastforward.desc: Activate fast-forward mode. Must have activated timewarp.

session.timewarp.rewind.name: Rewind (timewarp)
session.timewarp.rewind.desc: Rewind time. Must have activated timewarp.

session.savedgames.delete.name: Delete saved game
session.savedgames.delete.desc: Delete the saved game (in the save/load windows).

session.savedgames.noconfirmation.name: Delete without confirmation
session.savedgames.noconfirmation.desc: Don't ask for confirmation when deleting a saved game.
